AuditAssistant_ChatBot.name: AI Conversation Bot - Contract Intelligence System
AuditAssistant_ChatBot.description: Developed an AI document analysis system integrating LangChain RAG with Neo4j Graph RAG for contract review and compliance evaluation. Features entity extraction with provenance tracking, hybrid search, and ASC606/SOX compliance frameworks.

AnomalyDetection_JournalEntries.name: Journal Entries - Anomaly Detection System
AnomalyDetection_JournalEntries.description: Developed a machine learning-based anomaly detection system for journal entries using isolation forests and statistical analysis. Implemented automated flagging of unusual transactions with 95% accuracy.

Model_FineTuning_TransactionMatching.name: Reconciliation - Transaction Matching - LLM Fine-Tuning System (WIP)
Model_FineTuning_TransactionMatching.description: Fine-tuned a Mistral 7B LLM using LoRA/QLoRA to automate financial transaction reconciliation. The system matches transactions from sub-ledgers to General Ledger closing balances based on Company Code, G/L Account, and Profit Center, targeting 90%+ accuracy and 80-90% reduction in manual reconciliation effort.
features: Automated data cleaning and validation pipeline

IC_Automation.name: Inter-Company Automation (End-to-End)
IC_Automation.description: Built an end-to-end intercompany automation framework for SAP-based financial reconciliation. The system automates SAP data extraction, to final reporting
features: Automated SAP ledger data extraction via VBScript
Withholding Tax and GST liabilities computation

Working-with-PDF-Files.name: Working With PDF Files
Working-with-PDF-Files.description: Reading Bill of entry PDF files using regex Python, merge operations and more.

Extract-Text-from-JPEG.name: Document Text Extraction Tool
Extract-Text-from-JPEG.description: Built a Python application using regular expressions and OCR techniques to extract text from JPEG images. Handles bill of entry PDF files and converts them to structured data.

LinearRegression-Ridge-Lasso.name: Project - Regression Analysis Framework
LinearRegression-Ridge-Lasso.description: Implemented and compared multiple regression techniques including Linear Regression, Ridge, and Lasso regularization. Developed comprehensive analysis framework for model selection and hyperparameter tuning.

Random-Forest-Classifier.name: Project - Income Qualification ML Model
Random-Forest-Classifier.description: Project 2 on Machine Learning: Income Qualification. Built a Random Forest classifier to predict income qualification with feature engineering, cross-validation, and model optimization. Achieved high accuracy through ensemble learning techniques.

XGBoost.name: Project - Mercedes-Benz Manufacturing Optimization
XGBoost.description: Project 1 on Machine Learning: Mercedes-Benz Greener Manufacturing. Developed an XGBoost model to optimize manufacturing processes and reduce testing time. Implemented feature selection and hyperparameter optimization.

EmployeeAttrition.name: Project - Employee Attrition Prediction System
EmployeeAttrition.description: Machine Learning project applying MinMaxScalar on selected columns with Label Encoding & One Hot Encoding. Built predictive models to identify factors contributing to employee attrition. Implemented comprehensive data preprocessing pipeline.
